chapter.text: Aru mono ga, kudarubeki chobatsu ni tsuite tou
Fushinjin-sha wa, sore o fusegu koto wa dekinai
Kaidan no shu, arra kara (no chobatsu)dearu
Tenshi-tachi ya seirei (dai tenshi jiburiru) wa, tsuitachi ni shite, kare no moto ni noboru, sono (tsuitachi no) naga-sa wa, 5 man-nendearu
Dakara anata wa, rippa ni taeshinobe
Hontoni kare-ra wa, sore (Ni~Tsu) o toi to omou
Shikashi ware wa, sore o chikai to miru
Ten ga toketa do no yo ni naru hi
yamayama wa, suita yomo no yo ni nari
dare mo tomo (no anpi) o tou koto wanai
Kare-ra wa tagaini kao o awaseru koto ga dekinai hodo osoreru. Tsumi aru mono wa sonohi, jibun no tsumiwoaganau tame ni jibun no kodomo-tachi o sashidasou to negaudearou
Kare no tsuma ya kyodai
kare o kabatta kinshin
jibun o sukuerunaraba, chijo no subete no mono o agete aganau koto o koi negaudearou
Danjite dekinai. Hontoni kano (jigoku no) hono wa
atama no kawa made ken gi toru
(Seigi ni) se o misete, somuki satta-sha o shokan surudearou
Mata chikuseki shi, intoku no kin o motsu mono o mo
Ningen wa hontoni sewashinaku tsukura rete iru
Saiyaku ni aeba nageki kanashimi
koun ni aeba monooshimi ni naru
Daga reihai ni shojin suru mono wa,-sode wanai
Reihai o genshu shite iru mono
mata kare-ra no tomi ga, koseidearu to mitome rarete iru mono
monogoi suru mono ya taibo suru mono no tame ni (hodokosu mono)
mata shinpan no hi no shinjitsu o kakunin shite iru mono
mata kare-ra no omo no chobatsu o osoreru mono mo
Hontoni omo no chobatsu kara, anzendearu to kangaerubekide wanai
Mata kakureta tokoro (teisetsu) o mamoru mono
kare-ra no tsuma ya migite no shoyu suru mono ni kagitte iru baai wa betsu de,-zai ni wa naranai
Shikashi kore igai ni motomeru mono wa ho o koeta monodearu
Futaku sa reta koto ya yakusoku ni chujitsuna-sha
shogen ni koseina-sha
mata reihai o genshu suru mono
Korera no mono wa eiyo o ete rakuen no naka ni (sumu)
Ima fushinjin-sha-tachi ga, anata no kata ni isoide iru no wa nanigoto ka
Migi kara mata hidarikara,-gun ni natte
Kare-ra wa mina shifuku no rakuen ni hairu koto o nozomu no ka
Iya, danjite dekinai kotodearu. Hontoni ware wa, kare-ra ga shiru mono kara, kare-ra o tsukutta nodearu
Iya, ware wa azuma to nishi no omo ni yotte chikau. Ware ni totte wa kanodearu
Kare-ra yori mo sugureta (soto no)-sha o motte, kare-ra ni kaete yarou. Ware wa, shippai suru koto wa nai nodearu
Dakara anata wa, kare-ra o (kyoei ni) hitara se, tawamure ni makaseruga yoi. Kare-ra ga yakusoku sa rete iru, sonohi no kaiken made
Kare-ra ga haka kara awatadashiku detekuru-bi. Sore wa marude (gense de) kare-ra ga guzo kami e to isoida yo ni
Kare-ra wa me o fuse, kutsujoku o komurudearou. Kore ga kare-ra ni yakusoku sa rete ita, sonohidearu
